db:info.db:title: Bluetooth Low Energy Heart Listener Example

db:abstract.db:para: An example demonstrating the interaction with a Bluetooth Low Energy Heart Rate device/service. The example demonstrates the use of all Qt Bluetooth Low Energy classes.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = heartlistener
QT += quick bluetooth
# Input HEADERS += deviceinfo.h \ heartrate.h SOURCES += deviceinfo.cpp \ heartrate.cpp \ main.cpp
OTHER_FILES += assets/*.qml \ assets/*.js
RESOURCES += \ resources.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/bluetooth/heartlistener INSTALLS += target
